metadata.title: CVE-2023-32006 nodejs
metadata.description: The use of `module.constructor.createRequire()` can bypass the policy mechanism and require modules outside of the policy.json definition for a given module.  This vulnerability affects all users using the experimental policy mechanism in all active release lines: 16.x, 18.x, and, 20.x.  Please note that at the time this CVE was issued, the policy is an experimental feature of Node.js.
